channel.title: Super Mario Bros. on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Super Mario Bros. on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Lost (And Found) Levels
item.description: Today in Tedium: It took a while for us to culturally admit it, but video games are a form of art on the level of many filmsâ€”and that means that game developers are very much auteurs in the way that film directors are. (Or, depending on the game, schlockmeisters.) But as anyone who has ever used a Game Genie could tell you, there are things that developers don’t want you to see, at a basic level far removed from a mere easter egg.
